snippet.title: Siegius Trailer
snippet.description:
Trailer for the Flash game Siegius.

Features:
- Custom rendering engine means unlimited enemies and effects on screen with 0 slow down.
- 25 missions with unique objectives spanning across 3 separate campaigns.
- 14 beautifully detailed maps.
- Near limitless amounts of unit and spell combinations to chose from.
- Hundreds of lines of witty dialogue.
- Fun for the whole family!

Created by:
Justin Goncalves
Mike Sleva

Music by: Waterflame
http://www.youtube.com/user/waterflame89
